```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
Temp2<-read.csv("Temp2Data.csv")
```

```{r}
plot_ly(Temp2, x = ~Year, y = ~Degrees.C)|>
  layout(title = "Temperature change from 1958 to 2020 in 째C", yaxis = list(title = "Change in Temperature (째C)"))
```

```{r}
#in case plotly doesnt work:
Temp2|> ggplot(aes(x = Year, y = Degrees.C)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs( title = "Temperature change from 1958 to 2020 in 째C",
      y = "Change in Temperature (째C)",
      caption = "GISTEMP version 4")
```
